abstract: José Andrés Guardado Hernández (born 28 September 1986) is a Mexican professional footballer who plays for Bayer 04 Leverkusen on loan from Valencia CF and the Mexican national team, mainly playing as a left winger.Popularly known as Principito (Spanish for Little prince), he came through the youth ranks at Atlas, then signed with Deportivo in Spain, going on to remain with the club for several seasons, four in La Liga.A Mexican international since 2005, Guardado represented the country in two World Cups, two Gold Cups and the 2007 Copa America.
